menu_mhudu_enable_minimalism_countdown_d: If true, all addons start out disabled and are slowly enabled over time.
menu_mhudu_set_minimalism_countdown_inte: The number of seconds before each addon is enabled in Speedrun Mode.
menu_mhudu_enable_randomization_weighted: If true, order will be weighted to give a more even distribution of addon types. If false, order will be simply random.
menu_mhudu_readme_desc: Addons go here! They should be in the same format as the ones in the Base Addons folder, but don't put any new ones in there, or else they'll be overridden if you update MHUDU.
